description: The website displays a list of students where you can search, sort, filter, expel students, add them to the inquisitorial squad, or appoint a prefect.
By clicking the “Hack the system” logo in the upper right corner of the page, you mess students’ blood status, enroll yourself in Hogwarts, and remove all students from the squad, if any.
The e-commerce website for the Silfen start-up is a product of a group work. The main focus was on redesigning the company’s existing website to make it more accessible and easier to navigate.
I was responsible for building the landing, collections, and sustainability pages, that had to meet the client's wishes to be colorful and playful.
A sign-up form on the Ezone platform, an app that helps gamers improve their performance through advice and guidance related to training and lifestyle.
After answering questions in the form, users will receive content tailored to their personal needs.
In this product configurator, you can design your own sofa by choosing your preferred colors for the sofa body, cushions and legs.
In addition, you can add extra features to the product, such as large cushions, glasses and... a cat.
The e-commerce website for the Ullo start-up is a product of a group work. The main focus was to create a digital identity that could reach a younger audience.
Here I would like to showcase the landing page that I built. Motion graphics and video editing were done in Adobe Premiere Pro.
An animated clicker game with good objects that give you points and bad objects that take your lives.
The idea is to collect a certain amount of points before the time runs out and have at least one life left at the end of the game.
